data.title: Delicious food
data.text:
We have been going here for over 4 years since we moved to Rhode Island from Boston.
We especially like the Italian breads and pastries.  All are delicious.
They also have awesome cakes which you can order for special occasions or just to feast on.
Included is Charlie,s Deli which has great food.  I especially like Charlie's Special which is an Italian grinder, and their little meat pies.  Great coffee as well.

data.title: Great, fresh, quick
data.text: This is a great place to grab a quick grinder, sandwich or calzone when you are in a rush to work or home from work or just to have lunch. I love it there!

data.title: Fresh but usually not too flavorful
data.text: I eat here a lot. I love the pre packaged salads. I know, that sounds very unlikely, but they really are good. The dressings are excellent. I wish they would have the Mediterranean salad more often, that is my favorite. I get the chicken Caesar if the Mediterranean salad isn't there. Be sure to check the date...but, these salads go quickly, so it usually isn't an issue. Unfortunately, I have found most of the sandwiches and soups to be just average and not very flavorful. The cook does not know where the spices are. The soups are made with good ingredients, but I have to season them on the stove when I get home. It is too bad, because it would be nice to get some hot soup to eat there instead of having to take it home and fix it up. Overall, this place is one of the better places to eat lunch in this neighborhood.

data.title: locals favorite
data.text:
charlies and antonio's bakery share this location. antonio's is the best bakery in town with fresh italian bread in various styles. wonderful pastries and custom cakes for special occasions.

sheet pizza and very nice sandwiches on the charlie's side as well as calzones etc.
great stop for morning coffee or lunch as there are a few tables inside.

data.title: Deli and Bakery in one
data.text: Located in Antonio's Bakery. They make very good sandwiches. Several tables to sit and enjoy lunch while you stare at Antonio's pastry cases. Friendly staff.
